import React from 'react'; const EmployeeTable = () => { // Sample data const employees = [ { name: 'John Doe', base: 50000, hra: 10000, conveyance: 2000, attendance: 95, netPayable: 62000, ctc: 70000 }, { name: 'Jane Smith', base: 55000, hra: 11000, conveyance: 2200, attendance: 98, netPayable: 68200, ctc: 77000 }, // Add more sample data as needed ]; return (

Employee Salary Details

{employees.map((employee, index) => ( ))}
Name Base Salary HRA Conveyance Attendance (%) Net Payable CTC
{employee.name} ₹{employee.base.toLocaleString()} ₹{employee.hra.toLocaleString()} ₹{employee.conveyance.toLocaleString()} {employee.attendance}% ₹{employee.netPayable.toLocaleString()} ₹{employee.ctc.toLocaleString()}
); }; export default EmployeeTable;
